department.ch: 工業管理研究所碩士班

goal.en: "This course is to prepare students for being able to understand the procedure of planning and scheduling in a company. Use SAP ECC 6.0 for the lab course. The contents include the following:  Master Data - Material Master Data - Bill of Material (BOM) - Work Center - Routings  Planning and Execution with Final Assembly - Sales and Operations Planning - Planning Strategies - Demand Management - MRP - Consumption and Availability Check - Production Order"
goal.ch: "This course is to prepare students for being able to understand the procedure of planning and scheduling in a company. Use SAP ECC 6.0 for the lab course. method.ch: 講授 研討 實習/實驗

grading.en: "Class participation 30% Mid term test 25% Final test 25% Lab work 20%"
grading.ch: "出席率 30% 期中考 25% 期末考 25% 課堂實作 20%"
